title: Parker All-MLB - Give Opt-Out MLB'ers a Pass; Mahomes vs. Trout Mega Deals; Joe West Corona Conspiracies; Phillies 60-game season Preview
itunes:title: Parker All-MLB - Give Opt-Out MLB'ers a Pass; Mahomes vs. Trout Mega Deals; Joe West Corona Conspiracies; Phillies 60-game season Preview
description:
This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, Rob thinks MLB players opting out of the season should get a pass, why Mike Trout's mega deal is better than Patrick Mahomes, and why umpire Joe West is a moron for his COVID conspiracy theories. He's joined by the first African American female MLB agent Lonnie Murray to discuss how she's succeeded in a traditionally male dominated industry. Phillies beat writer Scott Lauber previews the Phillies for the shortened 60-game season. Click here to subscribe and download all of the latest Inside the Parker podcasts!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
